lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Nathan. Born February 28, 1919, Nate died peacefully in his sleep March 8, 2016. WWII Veteran. He is survived by his beloved wife of 68+ years, Miriam, his children David, Paul, Judith and Deborah and his grandchildren Jennifer, Sarah, Rachel, Alex, Darius, Dahlia and Solomon; his grandson Jessie greeted him with great exuberance this morning. Nate dedicated his life and passion to the practice of giving children the opportunity to be all they had in themselves to be. He touched the lives of generations through his work at The Wiltwyck School, Deer Lake Camp, The Walden School and Camp Regis. Truthfully, he never really left Brooklyn. Strength to your back! 1/3
